channel.title: 公开地暴露你的应用 on Hugo 主题的 Learn 文档
channel.description: Recent content in 公开地暴露你的应用 on Hugo 主题的 Learn 文档

item.title: Using a Service to Expose Your App
item.description: Objectives Learn about a Service in Kubernetes Understand how labels and LabelSelector objects relate to a Service Expose an application outside a Kubernetes cluster using a Service Overview of Kubernetes Services Kubernetes Pods are mortal. Pods in fact have a lifecycle. When a worker node dies, the Pods running on the Node are also lost. A ReplicaSet might then dynamically drive the cluster back to desired state via creation of new Pods to keep your application running.

item.title: 交互式教程 - 发布您的应用程序
item.description: 要与终端交互，请使用台式机/平板电脑 Continue to Module 5›
